thread.title: Indraprastha Gas raises stake in Maharashtra Natural Gas to 50%
thread.title_full: Indraprastha Gas raises stake in Maharashtra Natural Gas to 50% - Livemint

author: PTI
title: Indraprastha Gas raises stake in Maharashtra Natural Gas to 50%
text: New Delhi: Indraprastha Gas Ltd (IGL) on Monday said it has acquired 2.5 million more shares of Maharashtra Natural Gas Ltd (MNGL) to become 50% shareholder in the company. Earlier this year, IGL acquired 47.50 million shares in MNGL in the first tranche at a price of Rs. 38 from certain shareholders of MNGL. In a BSE filing, Indraprastha Gas Ltd said: “... In the second and final tranche, the company has acquired 25 lacs shares of MNGL at a price of Rs. 38 per equity shares of MNGL.” “Presently, the company holds 5 crore shares (constituting 50% of present paid up capital) of MNGL,” the filing added. MNGL is in the business of city gas distribution in Pune. In August 2014, IGL had said that it will invest Rs. 190 crore in Maharashtra Natural Gas by acquiring 50 million shares from institutional investors. Shares of IGL closed at Rs. 445.30 apiece, up 0.27% from the previous close on the BSE.
